SEARCH
Package shapes.interfaces

Interface Transformable

All Superinterfaces:
Movable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Circle, Rectangle, VectorialObject
public interface Transformable extends Movable
Interface for objects that can be transformed.

Extends Movable to include rotation and scaling operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    getScale()
    Returns the current scale factor of the object.
    void
    rotate(double r)
    Rotates the object by the specified angle.
    void
    scale(double s)
    Scales the object by the specified factor.

    move, setX, setY

  • Method Details

    • rotate

      void rotate(double r)
      Rotates the object by the specified angle.
      Parameters:
      r - the angle of rotation in degrees (or radians, based on implementation)

    • scale

      void scale(double s)
      Scales the object by the specified factor.
      Parameters:
      s - the scaling factor

    • getScale

      double getScale()
      Returns the current scale factor of the object.
